articles.title: About This Site
articles.contents:
About Me
My name is Akhilesh Sangaraju, and I am currently a rising sophomore
at Lexington High School. This site was part of my final project in
Kaneâ€™s Free High School Data Science Bootcamp, which I decided to join
due to my passion in coding, and my goal to become a programmer when I
grow up. Some of my other hobbies include math, science, and biking.
About the project
This project, titled Cars - CO2 Emissions and Effciency, was
inspired by my interest in cars and aims to inform individuals on which
ones are most eco-friendly, so they can make the right decision when it
comes time for them to buy one for themselves. The first graph shows
which companies produce the most efficient cars, and the second covers
the amount of energy that different electric vehicles take to drive a
kilometer.
Contact Info
Github: https://github.com/AkhileshSangaraju
E-mail: sakhileshvarma@gmail.com

articles.title: Cars - CO2 Emissions and Effciency
articles.description: This project's goal is to help you make the most eco-friendly decision when buying a new car!
